title: Motherhood
itunes:title: Motherhood
description:
Berlant and Novak discuss the pressure to have kids, religious upbringing, and the comic nature of twins. The hags role play an adoption fantasy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
